Package index

Core Data Structures

S3 classes and constructor functions for morphometric data types.

Datasets

Small datasets to play with

bot
Bottles dataset
hearts
Heart dataset
shapes
Shapes dataset
wings
Wings dataset

Coordinate Transformations

Functions to transform shape coordinates. These modify the coo column in tibbles.

bot
Bottles dataset
hearts
Heart dataset
p() draw_landmarks() draw_landmarks_as_numbers() draw_outlines() draw_centroid() draw_first_point() draw_links()
Minimal plotting system for morphometric shapes
shapes
Shapes dataset
wings
Wings dataset

Landmark Registration

Specialized functions for landmark-based alignment.

coo_baseline() coo_bookstein()
Baseline correction (Bookstein registration)

Information Extraction

Extract information from shapes without modifying them. Use within mutate() to add columns.

get_centroid() centroid()
Get centroid of a shape
get_centroid_size() centsize()
Get centroid size
get_centroid_size_norm() centsize_norm()
Get normalized centroid size

Shape Measurements

Measure scalar properties of shapes. Automatically adds columns to tibbles.

Visualization

Functions for plotting and visualizing morphometric data.

pile()
Plot shapes stacked together
mosaic()
Plot shapes in grid mosaic layout
p() draw_landmarks() draw_landmarks_as_numbers() draw_outlines() draw_centroid() draw_first_point() draw_links()
Minimal plotting system for morphometric shapes

Utilities

Helper functions and utilities.

get_coo_cols()
Identify coo columns in a tibble
rinse()
Clear the environment
`%>%`
Pipe operator

S3 Methods

Print and display methods for custom classes.

On this page

Momocs2 is developed by Vincent Bonhomme and contributors. Part of the MomX ecosystem.
